experience: You and Amy both know Jesse Martin
President | CEO | Finance Advisor | Marketing | Management | Virtual CFO |

According to the United States Chamber of Commerce, businesses with established success systems have a 97% success rate; whereas, businesses without these established tools have a comparatively low success rate of only 48% in their first 5 years.  What does that mean to you?  A person that has a franchise or a system behind them has at least a 50% more likely chance of having a successful business after 5 years.With Amy's Fit in 60 Barre In a Box program, you will learn how to avoid some of the largest mistakes made in business start up and save yourself over $50,000 – $100,000 per year in business operational costs!  How do we know?  Because Amy made those mistakes and created a process to help others avoid what she experienced.But in addition to extensive cost savings, Barre in a Box will also show you how to launch a studio quickly and successfully to make more money in your studio in less than 60 days! Did you know? Many successful studios are making between $250,000 and $500,000 per year!With Barre in a Box, you will receive the systems and support that you would get with a barre franchise, while still allowing you the opportunity to customize your business model to best fit your clientele.  Why?  Because, we want you to have the freedom and ability to do it your way on your terms. Interested?  Schedule a free-consultation with Amy herself and allow her to share with you all the benefits of becoming a barre studio owner.
CEO & President of Amy Mewborn, Inc. & Fit in 60 | Pilates | Barre | Fitness Expert | Business CFO
Carlsbad, CA and Carmel Valley, CA

Fit in 60 Pilates and Barre is all about total body transformation in less than 60 minutes a day in sixty days or less. Our efficient workouts provide resistance, cardio and flexibility and burn 500-700 calories in less than 60 minutes. Come to class and lift, sculpt, and transform your body. You’ll feel renewed enthusiasm for fitness and exercise, improve posture, increase strength, lose inches, sleep more restfully, and develop the grace of a dancer. Our certified instructors are waiting for you! Please visit us at http://fitin60.com, or call 858-509-4807.◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆ Do you want to open your own Pilates studio or barre studio, but don’t know how to begin? I offer business systems and coaching programs to help potential studio owners launch and run their own successful fitness business with out the rules, and fees of a franchise. I also work as a consultant to existing studio owners, so give me a call and let me know how I can support you. ◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆Specialties: Women's Fitness, Barre Fitness, Pilates, Women's Weight Loss, Women's Health, Women's Wellness, Fit in 60 Pilates and Barre, Barre Certifications, Client Motivation, Barre San Diego, Pilates San Diego, Barre Franchise, Barre Licensing, Barre Certification, Weight Loss, Barre Carlsbad, Pilates Carlsbad

My first love was financial planning, and I helped individuals and families plan for retirement, education and protection. The skills and experience I gained as a financial planner help me run my own studio today.At Fit in 60 I run a very tight ship and pride myself on having systems in place to take care of my clients no matter where they’re starting from. My studio has been successful through all economic climates, so as I branch out into the world of licensing, I feel confident that I can show aspiring studio owners the way to success in this industry. If you are interested in opening your own Fit in 60 studio one day, give me a call at 858-509-4807. Let’s talk about the possibilities!

summary: Amy started her finance career at American Express, while finishing her finance & management degree at Valparaiso University.  She began her first national securities education program–a Series 7.  When Amy left American Express to move to San Diego, she was advising over 600 families on how to grow & manage wealth.At Superior Planning, a boutique multi family office, her financial focus became family business owners, with an average net worth of $10M to $40M. She has worked with the Ford dealerships, Vinturi Wine Aerator, and multiple tech companies to help manage, grow, & distribute wealth.Amy carries a Series 7, Series 63, and a prestigious Series 24, to be a managerial supervisor of national securities dealers.  Her most prestigious finance training is her Certified Financial Planner certificate – a five year advanced training that includes Financial Planning, Investment Advisory, Tax Management, Insurance, & Estate Planning.  Amy received her first fitness certification with  Kore Pilates.  Although she loved pilates, she knew that for her, that path didn’t make financial sense.  She loved the method, but didn’t see appropriate profit margins to justify leaving a six figure finance career!  When she found barre, she loved the transformation in her body, but was really drawn to the financial strengths of a barre studio.In addition to being an up & coming fitness discipline; its low start up costs, low ongoing maintenance expenses, & the ability to teach 15–30 people in a class, made financial sense.  Her desire is to help women create & manage their own profitable fitness businesses – providing freedom to leave the corporate job they hate to have more time & money to do what they really love!Amy has been featured on - CBS, Fox, The WB,  KUSI, San Diego Magazine, Ranch and Coast, & iVillage.  She is a contributing editor for the Carmel Valley Life & a certified continuing education provider for the American Council on Exercise (ACE).
